name: Valley Baptist Church Community Outreach Center
description: Community outreach center providing Celebrate Recovery program for individuals dealing with addiction, hurts, and hang-ups. Offers faith-based support and recovery services to the community.
source: Verified from CR Locator and additional research
eligibility_requirements: Open to anyone seeking recovery from addiction, hurts, or hang-ups
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2025-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information and program details verified from CR Locator https://crlocator.com/results/2c1e2fc6-5772-4951-8f20-db1a0faa9e63. Ministry leader Katheryn Pope confirmed as contact person. Celebrate Recovery program meets Mondays at 6:45 PM. Address verified as 36 Castle Village Dr, Brodhead, KY 40409. Phone number (606) 308-3099 confirmed working. Email katpope1953@msn.com verified. Organization is part of Valley Baptist Church's community outreach efforts.
